meanings.sent1: He abstains from eating sweets to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: She usually abstains from gossiping about others.
meanings.sent3: The cat abstains from chasing mice on Sundays.
meanings.sent4: The tree abstains from shedding its leaves until autumn.
meanings.sent5: The student abstains from using their phone during exams.

meanings.sent1: They abstain from drinking soda to reduce sugar intake.
meanings.sent2: I often abstain from eating fast food for a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The robot abstains from consuming electricity after midnight.
meanings.sent4: The car abstains from guzzling gas on long road trips.
meanings.sent5: The bird abstains from devouring all the seeds in one go.
